import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef, useContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import logoutIcon from "../img/logout.png"; import logouts from "../img/logouts.png"; import AuthContext from "../session"; import userm from "../img/userm.png"; import edit from "../img/edit.png"; //import "./prof.css"; const NavBar2 = () => { const { user, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); // Appeler la fonction de déconnexion du contexte d'authentification navigate("/login"); // Rediriger l'utilisateur vers la page de connexion après la déconnexion }; const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); let menuRef = useRef(); useEffect(() => { const handleMenuToggle = () => { const menu = document.querySelectorAll(".navbar-menu"); for (let j = 0; j < menu.length; j++) { menu[j].classList.toggle("hidden"); } }; const burger = document.querySelectorAll(".navbar-burger"); if (burger.length) { for (let i = 0; i < burger.length; i++) { burger[i].addEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } const close = document.querySelectorAll(".navbar-close"); if (close.length) { for (let i = 0; i < close.length; i++) { close[i].addEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } const backdrop = document.querySelectorAll(".navbar-backdrop"); if (backdrop.length) { for (let i = 0; i < backdrop.length; i++) { backdrop[i].addEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } // Clean up event listeners when component unmounts return () => { if (burger.length) { for (let i = 0; i < burger.length; i++) { burger[i].removeEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } if (close.length) { for (let i = 0; i < close.length; i++) { close[i].removeEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } if (backdrop.length) { for (let i = 0; i < backdrop.length; i++) { backdrop[i].removeEventListener("click", handleMenuToggle); } } }; }, []); return (
